Class DesktopContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • DesktopContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.applet.AppletContext, java.lang.Runnable

    class DesktopContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.applet.AppletContext, java.lang.Runnable
    An implementation of AppletContext, optimized for desktop apps. It's not complete though, only the methods needed by Nfm2 are implemented.
